I have a test with a @Before method that is throwing an exception. The
exception is caught by the BeforeAndAfterRunner which invokes addFailure
executing "notifier.fireTestFailure(...).

None of the actual test methods for this test get executed as expected.
However, in the eclipse plugin the node for that test is green as are all of
the subnodes for the methods. The nodes don't have the check annotation, but
no indication that a failure occured is provided. The exception message is
completely eaten. 

The only way I was able to determine what why that tests was not run was to
debug into the Junit4.1 code.

Is this a know issue, or might I be missing something?

thanks!
